trans-unit.source: Represents an object that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />와 연결된 개체를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread that the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> directly.
trans-unit.target: 스레드만 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> 만들어진 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To access a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> from a thread other than the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> was created on, call <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 스레드가 아닌 스레드에서 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 만들어진 켜 짐 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 연결 된입니다.

trans-unit.source: Subclasses of <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> that need to enforce thread safety can do so by calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> on all public methods.
trans-unit.target: 서브 클래스 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 는 필요한 스레드를 적용 하려면 안전 그렇게 할 수를 호출 하 여 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 에서 모든 공용 메서드.

trans-unit.source: This guarantees the calling thread is the thread that the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> was created on.
trans-unit.target: 보장 호출 스레드는 스레드는는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 에 만들었습니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> cannot be independently instantiated; that is, all constructors are protected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 독립적으로 인스턴스화할 수 있습니다; 즉, 모든 생성자 보호 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> have thread affinity.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 스레드 선호도 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Objects that derive from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> are free-threaded when they are frozen.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 는 자유 스레드 때 고정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 [Freezable 개체 개요](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)를 참조하세요.

trans-unit.source: Any public <see langword="static" /> members of this type are thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 모든 공용 <see langword="static" /> 이 형식의 멤버는 스레드로부터 안전 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 인터페이스 멤버는 스레드로부터 안전하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: This object can be accessed only from the thread on which it was created.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체는 생성 된 스레드에서만에서 액세스할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to access it from other threads will throw an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: 에 다른 스레드에서 액세스 하려고 하면 throw 됩니다는 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority,System.Delegate)" /> or <see cref="M:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority,System.Delegate)" /> provide support for marshalling work to the correct thread.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority,System.Delegate)" /> 또는 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherPriority,System.Delegate)" /> 마샬링 작업을 올바른 스레드에 대 한 지원을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the calling thread has access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드가 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the calling thread has access to this object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드에서 이 개체에 액세스할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 스레드는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> 만들어진 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any thread can check to see whether it has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 모든 스레드에서이에 대 한 액세스를가지고 있는지 확인 하려면 확인할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> is that <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean that specifies whether the calling thread has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception if the calling thread does not have access to the this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 차이 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 은 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 호출 스레드에서이에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 지정 하는 부울 값을 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 호출 스레드를 권한이 없는 경우 예외를 throw 합니다.는 이 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method is identical to calling <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 호출 하는 것은 호출 동일 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.CheckAccess%2A> 연관 된 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> was created on.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 스레드가 스레드에 액세스할 수 있는지 확인 하려면 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 에 만들었습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is called to verify access to the thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 에서 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 스레드에 대 한 액세스를 확인 하기 위해 호출 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread has access, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is updated by just accessing the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>; otherwise, a delegate, which accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as an argument, is posted onto the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드가 액세스 권한을 보유 한 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 방금의 멤버에 액세스 하 여 업데이트 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, 그렇지 않으면 허용 하는 대리자는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 에 게시를 인수로 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" /> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />와 연결된 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: 디스패처입니다.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread that the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> directly.
trans-unit.target: 스레드만 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> 만들어진 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 직접 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To access a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> from a thread other than the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> was created on, call <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 에 액세스 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 스레드가 아닌 스레드에서 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 만들어진 켜 짐 호출 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.Invoke%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 연결 된입니다.

trans-unit.source: Enforces that the calling thread has access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드에서 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />에 액세스할 수 있는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: Only the thread the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> was created on may access the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 스레드는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.Dispatcher%2A> 만들어진 액세스할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Any thread can check to see whether it has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 모든 스레드에서이에 대 한 액세스를가지고 있는지 확인 하려면 확인할 수 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The difference between <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> is that <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> returns a Boolean that specifies whether the calling thread has access to this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> throws an exception if the calling thread does not have access to the this <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>.
trans-unit.target: 차이 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 은 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.CheckAccess%2A> 호출 스레드에서이에 액세스할 수 있는지 여부를 지정 하는 부울 값을 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 호출 스레드를 권한이 없는 경우 예외를 throw 합니다.는 이 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> to determine whether a thread has access to the thread that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> was created on.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject.VerifyAccess%2A> 스레드가 스레드에 액세스할 수 있는지 확인 하려면 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 에 만들었습니다.

trans-unit.source: If the calling thread does not have access, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드가 액세스, 없는 경우는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: the calling thread does not have access to this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 호출 스레드에서 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject" />에 액세스할 수 없는 경우
